site.title: This Site
site.description: This site is fully open source. Technologies being used include Node, Express, Pug, and Bootstrap.

analysis.title: Economic Analysis of Sales
analysis.description: I am currently working on a project to add an analysis view for customer sales for Datacor CRM using React. This analysis is a grading system assigning a grade depending where in the business cycle they are.
links: ITR Economics' Rate of Change model

iasip.title: IASIP Soundboard
iasip.description: This is a discord bot that operates as a soundboard for quotes from 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia'.
links: Invite this bot to your server!
